noperm.value: このコマンドを実行する権限がありません。

offline.value: プレイヤーが見つかりません。

nosel.value: 何も選択されていません。

description.value: WorldEditArtをアップデートしてください。

response.value:
この錆は、WorldEditArt %PLUGIN_AUTHORS% 作 v %PLUGIN_VERSION% を使用しております。.
あなたは、%LANG_NAME% v%LANG_VERSION% %LANG_AUTHORS% による翻訳がつかわれています。

description.value: Define one of the vertex positions of your cuboid selection

1.value:
//1 [.b] [,b <bookmark name>] [,p <player name>] [,n <selection name>]
.b - use your default bookmark instead of your current position
,b <name> - use the bookmark called <name> instead of your current position
,p <player> - use the position of the online player <player> instead of your position
,n <selection name> - specifies the name of the selection, default to "default"

2.value:
//2 [.b] [,b <bookmark name>] [,p <player name>]
.b - use your default bookmark instead of your current position
,b <name> - use the bookmark called <name> instead of your current position
,p <player> - use the position of the online player <player> instead of your position

success.value: Selected (%COORD_X%, %COORD_Y%, %COORD_Z%) as point %POINT_ID% of the cuboid.

description.value: Define one of the two base centers of your cylinder selection

1.value:
//1 [.b] [,b <bookmark name>] [,p <player name>] [,n <selection name>]
.b - use your default bookmark instead of your current position
,b <name> - use the bookmark called <name> instead of your current position
,p <player> - use the position of the online player <player> instead of your position
,n <selection name> - specifies the name of the selection, default to "default"

2.value:
//2 [.b] [,b <bookmark name>] [,p <player name>]
.b - use your default bookmark instead of your current position
,b <name> - use the bookmark called <name> instead of your current position
,p <player> - use the position of the online player <player> instead of your position

success.value: Selected (%COORD_X%, %COORD_Y%, %COORD_Z%) as %TOP_OR_BASE% center of the cylinder

description.value: Change all blocks in your selection into certain block type(s)

usage.value:
//s <blocks separated by commas>
Check the user guide at http://lgpe.co/wea for advanced usage

inProgress.value: Block setting is taking place now...

toString.value: cylinder of %RADIUS% blocks radius from (%X_BOTTOM%, %Y_BOTTOM%, %Z_BOTTOM%) to (%X_TOP%, %Y_TOP%, %Z_TOP%)
sphere of %RADIUS% blocks radius centered at (%X%, %Y%, %Z%)

warnedEntry.value: %TASK_NAME%: %PROGRESS_PERC%% done (%WARNINGS_CNT% blocks blocked by safe mode)
